title: Windward (v2015-05-29.1)
description:
== About the game:
Windward is an action-filled multiplayer sandbox game that puts you in control of a ship sailing the high seas of a large procedurally-generated world.

Designed from the start to be a fully procedural co-op game, Windward can be played both by yourself and with friends. Start by generating a procedural world that will be unique to you, then sail forward fighting pirates, trading with towns, doing quests or simply exploring -- it's up to you how you want to play.


== Version:
Steam v2015-05-29.1 full game, by LuKeStorm from May, 30 2015. 
Thanks to LuKeStorm for updating


== Instructions:
1. Extract anywhere (7zip - download link below)
2. Open "SmartSteamEmu.ini" and change "PersonaName" to your nick.
3. Launch SmartSteamLoader.exe and Play (Both LAN and Online legit play) 


== System Requirements:
Minimum:
Processor: 1.4GHz dual-core Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent 
Video card: Intel HD Graphics 4200 
System memory:: 2 GB RAM 
Operating system: Windows Vista / 7 / 8
Hard disk drive: 250 MB available space
